casebody.data:
STATE EX REL. TAYSE
v.
SUMMIT CTY. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS. 2018-0069 Supreme Court of Ohio. April 25, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

O'Connor, C.J., and O'Donnell, Kennedy, French, Fischer, DeWine, and DeGenaro, JJ., concur.

MERIT DECISIONS WITHOUT OPINIONS

In Mandamus. On respondents' motion to dismiss. Motion granted. Cause dismissed. On respondents' motion to deem relator a vexatious litigator. Motion denied. On relator's motion to strike. Motion denied as moot.
